games.title: Car Destruction King
games.description:
Drive different cars, test your strength with rotating hammers, presses, catapults and other obstacles!
Take part in the races and set new records.
Slow down time for a more realistic crash.
Choose different maps and different game modes!
games.howToPlayText:
Controls:
TAB - pause menu (or Escape)

Driving - WASD.
Spacebar - handbrake.
Shift - nitro.
C - change camera.
R - reset car.
K - restore car.
N - switch car.
B - slow motion.

For mobile devices, use the game interface.
